abstract: Stocks decline again amid concerns over Greece's debts, putting major indexes on track for a weekly loss.
lead_paragraph: Stocks swung lower as an impasse between Greece and its creditors dragged on. The drop put major indexes on track for a weekly loss.

headline.main: Market Slides Back as Deadline for Greece Nears
headline.print_headline: Uncertainty About Greek Debt Agreement Knocks Markets Lower; Oil Plunges

snippet: Stocks swung lower as an impasse between Greece and its creditors dragged on. The drop put major indexes on track for a weekly loss.
